TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: Binds the value of a property of a to a parameter object.

span.span: Binds the value of a property of a to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用類別繫結的值屬性，例如或，若要使用參數化的 SQL 查詢、 商務物件方法或篩選運算式中的參數。You can use the class to bind the value of a property, such as or , to a parameter that is used in a parameterized SQL query, business object method, or filtering expression. 類別提供兩個屬性，除了繼承自類別：和。The class provides two properties in addition to those inherited from the class: and . 屬性將識別哪些繫結至執行個體和屬性會識別的公用屬性從中類別擷取的值。The property identifies which instance to bind to and the property identifies the public property of the from which the class retrieves a value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件將顯示在資料繫結控制項的選取值宣告式案例中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to bind data displayed in a control to the selected value of a control in a declarative scenario. 物件加入至集合控制項在表單中，而會對應至"@Title」 中的預留位置文字屬性。The object is added to the collection of the control on the form, and corresponds to the "@Title" placeholder text in the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是必要的屬性，可識別執行個體物件將繫結至執行階段。The property is a required property that identifies the instance that the object binds to at run time. 一般而言，和設定的屬性方法，以正確繫結至控制項。Typically, the and properties are set for the method to correctly bind to a control. 如果您未設定屬性，方法會擲回例外狀況時呼叫。If you do not set the property, the method throws an exception when called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件將顯示在資料繫結控制項的選取值宣告式案例中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to bind data displayed in a control to the selected value of a control in a declarative scenario. 物件加入至集合控制項在表單中，而會對應至"@Title」 中的預留位置文字屬性。The object is added to the collection of the control on the form, and corresponds to the "@Title" placeholder text in the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定和識別控制項的屬性，物件繫結至。The following code example demonstrates how to set the and properties to identify the control that a object is bound to. 此範例會填入控制項值。The example populates a control with values. 屬性控制項用來篩選所擷取的資料控制和顯示控制項。The property of the control is used to filter data retrieved by a control and displayed by a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/CS/webform1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/VB/webform1vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件嘗試繫結至物件和屬性每次方法呼叫。The object attempts to bind to the object and property every time the method is called. 方法會傳回控制項的屬性所識別的組合值和屬性。The method returns the value of the control's property that is identified by the combination of the and properties. 類別永遠不會使用屬性，都繼承自，當繫結至控制項的屬性值。The class never uses the property, which is inherited from , when binding to a control's property value. > [!NOTE] > 在此實作中的方法，`context`參數已忽略。In this implementation of the method, the `context` parameter is ignored. 如果`control`參數是`null`，`null`傳回。If the `control` parameter is `null`, `null` is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別的公用屬性所識別的物件屬性，物件將繫結至執行階段。The property identifies the public property of the object identified by the property that the object binds to at run time. 可以設定成簡單字串，例如"SelectedValue"，或使用運算式來識別為複雜控制項屬性的語法。 can be set to a simple string, such as "SelectedValue", or an expression using syntax to identify complex control properties. 雖然屬性通常是選擇性的同時和設定的屬性方法，以正確繫結至控制項。While the property is optional, typically both and properties are set for the method to correctly bind to a control. 如果您設定屬性，但不是屬性，方法嘗試使用屬性識別預設屬性。If you set the property but not the property, the method attempts to use the attribute to identify a default property. （它是控制項來指定這個屬性的作者責任）。如果失敗，會擲回例外狀況。(It is the responsibility of control authors to specify this attribute.) If this fails, throws an exception. 下表會識別哪一個 ASP.NET 控制項裝飾屬性屬性。The following table identifies which ASP.NET controls decorate properties with the attribute. |控制項Control|屬性Property| |-------------|--------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件將顯示在資料繫結控制項的選取值宣告式案例中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to bind data displayed in a control to the selected value of a control in a declarative scenario. 控制項衍生自控制項。The control derives from the control. 物件加入至集合控制項在表單中，而會對應至"@Title」 中的預留位置文字屬性。The object is added to the collection of the control on the form, and corresponds to the "@Title" placeholder text in the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/CS/webform1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/VB/webform1vb.aspx#1)]
